com.gocardless.services

Class MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gocardless.http.PostRequest<MandatePdf>
      • com.gocardless.services.MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest
  • Enclosing class:
    MandatePdfService

    public static final class MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest
extends PostRequest<MandatePdf>

    Request class for MandatePdfService.create().

    Generates a PDF mandate and returns its temporary URL.

    Customer and bank account details can be left blank (for a blank mandate), provided manually, or inferred from the ID of an existing mandate.

    To generate a PDF mandate in a foreign language, set your Accept-Language header to the relevant ISO 639-1 language code. Supported languages are Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish.

    • Method Detail

      • withAccountHolderName

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withAccountHolderName(String accountHolderName)

        Name of the account holder, as known by the bank. Usually this matches the name of the customer. This field cannot exceed 18 characters.

      • withAccountNumber

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withAccountNumber(String accountNumber)

        Bank account number - see local details for more information. Alternatively you can provide an iban.

      • withBankCode

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withBankCode(String bankCode)

        Bank code - see local details for more information. Alternatively you can provide an iban.

      • withBic

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withBic(String bic)

        SWIFT BIC. Will be derived automatically if a valid iban or local details are provided.

      • withBranchCode

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withBranchCode(String branchCode)

        Branch code - see local details for more information. Alternatively you can provide an iban.

      • withCountryCode

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withCountryCode(String countryCode)

        ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code. Required if providing local details.

      • withIban

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withIban(String iban)

        International Bank Account Number. Alternatively you can provide local details.

      • withLinks

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withLinks(MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest.Links links)

      • withLinksMandate

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withLinksMandate(String mandate)

        ID of an existing mandate to build the PDF from. The customer’s bank details will be censored in the generated PDF. No other parameters may be provided alongside this.

      • withMandateReference

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withMandateReference(String mandateReference)

        Unique 6 to 18 character reference. This may be left blank at the point of signing.

      • withScheme

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withScheme(String scheme)

        Direct Debit scheme. Can be supplied or automatically detected from the bank account details provided. If you do not provide a scheme, you must provide either a mandate, an iban, or local details including a country_code.

      • withSignatureDate

        public MandatePdfService.MandatePdfCreateRequest withSignatureDate(String signatureDate)

        If provided, a form will be generated with this date and no signature field.
